18#include "BitMatrix.h"
19#include "ODUPCAWriter.h"
20#include "ODEAN13Writer.h"
21
22#include <stdexcept>
23
24namespace ZXing {
25namespace OneD {
26
27BitMatrix
28UPCAWriter::encode(const std::wstring& contents, int width, int height) const
29{
30 // Transform a UPC-A code into the equivalent EAN-13 code, and add a check digit if it is not already present.
31 size_t length = contents.length();
32 if (length != 11 && length != 12) {
33 throw std::invalid_argument("Requested contents should be 11 or 12 digits long");
34 }
35 return EAN13Writer().setMargin(_sidesMargin).encode(L'0' + contents, width, height);
36}
37
38} // OneD
39} // ZXing
40
